name: The Visitor (itch) (Vishcorp Games)
description:
Can you escape a maniac who has captured you?!

You only have one chance, you can't hide because he knows where you are! BUT you can RUN. 

Run for your life, as fast as you can... IF YOU WANT TO LIVE!

"HE SEES EVERYTHING, HE KNOWS WHERE YOU ARE, HE ..... IS COMING FOR YOU!"

  • CONTROLS:
  1. 'W','A','S','D' TO MOVE
  2. 'E' TO INTERACT
  3. 'ESC' TO PAUSE/UNPAUSE

PS:  Please let me know what you think about the game! Your feedback really helps.
